Summary: Biochemical reaction from carvedilol to 4'-hydroxyphenyl carvedilol. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2D6 or CYP3A4.
Biochemical reaction from carvedilol to 5'-hydroxyphenyl carvedilol. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2D6 or CYP2E1.
Biochemical reaction from carvedilol to o-desmethyl carvedilol. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP1A2, CYP2D6, CYP2E1 or CYP2C9.
Biochemical reaction from carvedilol to carvedilol glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT2B7, UGT2B4 or UGT1A1.
Biochemical reaction from carvedilol to 8-hydroxycarvedilol. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A4 or CYP1A2.
Transport from carvedilol to carvedilol. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCB1 or ABCC2.
